bcpseg’s documentation¶

bcpseg – Library for Bayesian Changepoint Segmentation¶

The Cython-based implementation for the Bayesian Changepoint Segmentation efficiently deals with many values.

bcpseg() provides a fast implementation of Bayesian Changepoint Segmentation

See the code and discuss development on GitHub.

If you are interested in additional tools try BioscienceStack.

Release Notes¶

Version 0.1.1¶

Updates for interval output

  • Outputs an IntervalArray

Version 0.1.0¶

Documentation overhaul

  • Creation of documentation for bcpseg()
